edu.vserver.exercises.model
Interface SubmissionType

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardSubmissionType
public interface SubmissionType

Type of certain submission. Used to differentiate between user and system initiated submissions (the latter is used for auto-saving the state in which the executor is, for example to guard against networking errors).

Author:
Riku Haavisto, Johannes Holvitie

Method Summary
 boolean isBackgroundSubmission()
          If the submission is just back-ground a submission, nothing should be shown on the user-interface even if no submission can be made because of inconsistent execution-state at the moment.
 boolean isOnlyForSavingState()
           This submission-type is used only for extracting and storing the current SubmissionInfo from the executor.
 

Method Detail

isBackgroundSubmission

boolean isBackgroundSubmission()
If the submission is just back-ground a submission, nothing should be shown on the user-interface even if no submission can be made because of inconsistent execution-state at the moment.

Returns:
whether the submission type in question is back-ground submission or not

isOnlyForSavingState

boolean isOnlyForSavingState()

This submission-type is used only for extracting and storing the current SubmissionInfo from the executor. The SubmissionInfo can be used to later load the state the executor was in.

If this is set to true, even a successful submission of this type should not clear the flag that there are unsubmitted changes in the current executor, as this is not a real submission but only a "save".

As no real submission will be made it is allowed to pass also SubmissionInfo objects that cannot be graded or do not contain all the answers needed to answer certain question, as long as re-loading the executor with such SubmissionInfo is possible.

Returns:
whether this submission will be used only for saving the executor's state
